job.title: Data Scientist, Operations Decision Science
job.description:
The Operations Analysis & Performance (OAP) team at Delta provides analytical support across all major operations areas of the company. OAP's newly formed decision science team seeks a data science analytics leader to take on developing insights, models and solutions aimed at continually improving airline performance and decision making.
An appropriate candidate will have a proven experience in data model building, optimization, machine learning techniques and other analytics solution building. The candidate should have excellent organizational and communication skills and feel comfortable in a fast-paced environment. The role will support the delivery of an analytics transformation at Delta Air Lines.
